mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MUSIC WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM, MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, MUS_GEN, MUS_TIME, MUS_MV, STATUS, COUNT, ALBUM_PATH, ENROLL_DATE FROM (SELECT MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, MUS_GEN, MUS_TIME, MUS_MV, STATUS, COUNT, ALBUM_PATH, ENROLL_DATE FROM MUSIC WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNT DESC)
SELECT MUS_NO, MUS_NAME FROM MUSIC WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, ALBUM_PATH FROM(SELECT MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, ALBUM_PATH FROM MUSIC ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 15
SELECT MUS_NO, MUS_NAME FROM MUSIC WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND MUS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY MUS_NO DESC
SELECT MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, MUS_GEN FROM MUSIC WHERE MUS_NO = #{musNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSIC ( MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, MUS_GEN, MUS_TIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_MUS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{musName}, #{musArt}, #{musGen}, '3:00' )
